title: Lagrangians for the W-Algebra Models
abstract: The field algebra of the minimal models of W-algebras is amenable to a very simple description as a polynomial algebra generated by few elementary fields, corresponding to order parameters. Using this description, the complete Landau-Ginzburg lagrangians for these models are obtained. Perturbing these lagrangians we can explore their phase diagrams, which correspond to multicritical points with $D_n$ symmetry. In particular, it is shown that there is a perturbation for which the phase structure coincides with that of the IRF models of Jimbo et al.
